summary: This document is an email exchange between Jes Staley and Jeffrey Epstein discussing financial matters related to investment positions. Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank, responds to Epstein's concerns about financial losses. The communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.

persons.name: Jes Staley
persons.context: Jes Staley is identified as the CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank, responding to Jeffrey Epstein's email regarding financial positions.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the sender of the email expressing concerns about financial losses in his investment positions.

connections.description: Jes Staley, as CEO of JPMorgan, is in a client relationship with Jeffrey Epstein, who is discussing his investment positions.

keyFacts: Jes Staley is the CEO of JPMorgan's Investment Bank.
Jeffrey Epstein expresses concerns about losing 6 million dollars in investment positions.
The email communication is marked as confidential and may contain privileged information.
